headline: Looking at the Narrative for Colgate-Palmolive After Analyst Revisions and Strategic Updates
summary: Colgate-Palmolive’s consensus analyst price target has recently shifted lower, moving from $93.11 to $90.74 in response to evolving views on the company’s valuation and prospects. This downward revision reflects a balance of optimism in the company’s strong global brands and presence in growth markets, along with caution stemming from softer revenue growth forecasts and ongoing industry pressures. Stay tuned to learn how you can track future changes in the Colgate-Palmolive story as analysts...
